'''Sky Kitsune Statues''' are statues found in [[Inazuma]]. They are similar to [[Earth Kitsune Statue]]s.

In the [[Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual]] World Quest Series, you encounter several of these statues and may need to obtain a [[Ward]] from them by applying {{Electro}} to the statue.

==Locations==
* [[Araumi]]
* [[Konda Village]]
* [[Mt. Yougou]]
* Northeast of the [[Kamisato Estate]]
